Title: Rockets vs. Bulls odds, line, spread: 2021 NBA picks, Feb. 22 predictions from model on 83-48 roll
Description: The slumping Houston Rockets will be out to halt a seven-game losing streak when they host the Chicago Bulls and high-scoring Zach LaVine on Monday. The Rockets (11-17) will be playing at home for the first time in 11 days after a pair of games were postponed over the weekend due to severe weather that has gripped Texas.
Author: CBSSports.com on MSN.com
